Name: Batallas Galacticas
About the game: The space transport company is hiring drivers and driving spaceships is a lot like driving your car so go to the job interview and collect that salary! by the way in space there are sea monsters who like to fight Drive and compete against other cars! Dodge the obstacles and try not to destroy the rocket Face the sea monsters that live in space! -Short Game, you can finish this in less than 5 minutes-
